mapper.sql: info.id id, info.village_name villageName, info.area, info.price, info.images, info.toward, info.description, info.toilet, info.rental_method, info.kitchen, info.balcony, info.cover, detail.water_rate waterRate, detail.power_rate powerRate, FROM_UNIXTIME(info.create_time) createTime, FROM_UNIXTIME(info.update_time) updateTime, ( SELECT region01.`NAME` FROM nc_region region01 WHERE region01.id = detail.region_id ) address, ( SELECT region02.`NAME` FROM nc_region region02 WHERE region02.id = detail.district_id ) district, ( SELECT house_type.`NAME` FROM house_type WHERE house_type.id = info.house_type_id ) houseType, ( SELECT subway01.NAME FROM nc_subway subway01 WHERE subway01.id = detail.subway_station_id ) subwayStation, ( SELECT subway02.NAME FROM nc_subway subway02 WHERE subway02.id = detail.subway_line_id ) subwayLine

select
FROM house_info info LEFT JOIN house_detail_info detail ON detail.house_id = info.id LEFT JOIN house_type ON house_type.id = info.house_type_id
and info.village_name like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
